result.ga: Cé acu bean a phósfaidh tú
result.orig: Cé acu bean a phósfaidh tú
result.html: Cé acu bean a phósfaidh túWhich woman will you marry?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu bean a ṗósfaiḋ túWhich woman will you marry?

result.html: Phósfainn duine ar bithI'd marry anybody!
result.ponchtml: Ṗósfainn duine ar biṫI'd marry anybody!

result.eng: This single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.
result.ga: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósadh
result.orig: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósadh
result.html: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósadhThis single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.
result.ponchtml: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósaḋThis single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.

result.ga: Bhí aige le Babaí a phósadh
result.orig: Bhí aige le Babaí a phósadh
result.html: Bhí aige le Babaí a phósadhHe had to marry Babaí.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí aige le Babaí a ṗósaḋHe had to marry Babaí.
